Structure and manage integrated, multi-track project performance databases for multiple digital, print, social, broadcast, and experiential projects, with an eye on overall progress.      Develop and maintain partnerships with outside resources including third-party vendors and researchers.      Monitor and assign resources appropriately to streamline project efficiency and maximize deliverable outputs.      Report project outcomes and/or risks to the appropriate management channels as needed escalating issues as necessary based on project work plans.          Skills:          12+ years project management experience      Hands-on experience with developing web technologies and software platforms for maximum usability      Proven success working with all levels of management.      Strong written and verbal communication skills      Strong presentation skills      Strong Client Management and Relationship          Bachelors in technology/Computer science or equivalent with experience of working in different multinationals.      Experience of delivering P2P/ERP, Vendor Management, Client Management      Experience/Delivering experience on Enterprise solutions.      Professional certification would be an advantage including PMP/PRINCE II      Previous success in producing deliverable software platforms.      Strong attention to deadlines, team management and budgetary guidelines      Experience developing in-house platforms for internal processes.      Experience coaching and educating project teams to strengthen team members capabilities and skill sets.

column2: The Program Manager defines the objectives and develops suitable strategies for the program.      The career progression begins with assignments to formulate, organize, and monitor inter-connected projects and gradually shift towards assessing program performance in order to maximize ROI, controlling deadlines, budgets, etc. and evaluating project managers and other staff        DETAILED RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES:        Plans the delivery of the overall program and its activities in accordance with the mission and goals of the organization          Develops an annual budget and operating plan to support the program          Ensures that program activities operate within the policies and procedures of the organization          Ensures that program activities comply with all relevant legislation and professional standards          Oversees the collection and maintenance of records on the clients of the program for statistical purposes according to the confidentiality/privacy policy of the organization          Supervises program staff by providing direction, input, and feedback          Coordinates the delivery of services among different program activities to increase efficiency          Monitors and approves all budgeted program expenditures          Develops and implements long-term goals and objectives to achieve successful outcome of program          Develops a program evaluation framework to assess the strengths of the program and to identify areas for improvement          Interviews and selects well-qualified program staff          Establishes and implements a performance management process for all program staff          Ensures all staff members receive orientation and appropriate training in accordance with organizational standards          Monitors cash flow projections. Manages all project funds according to established accounting policies and procedures          Ensures financial reports and supporting documentation for funders are prepared as outlined in funding agreements          Identifies and evaluates the risks associated with program activities and take appropriate action to control the risks        SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES:      Leads a team      Qualifications:      Skills:      Required        Strong communication (both business and technical) and interpersonal skills          Detail-oriented, project management skills          Ability to support large, cross-functional projects          Ability to solve program issues and manage risks effectively          Ability to break down problems and estimate effort          Ability to establish reporting cadence, reports, and metrics          Deep Knowledge of Project Management Tools and Processes          Familiarity with Agile / Scrum principles        Certificates / Training:        Required: Project Management Professional (PMP) certification          Preferred :SAFe SPC        Experience:        3+ years of program management experience or equivalent          7+ years of project management experience or equivalent        Education:      Required        Bachelor's in Information Technology, Business or equivalent        Principles & Related Competencies:      Ethical        Complies with policies and procedures; Takes the high road and upholds our values; Maintains confidentiality; Acts with integrity, honesty and respect.        Leader        Communicates the big picture whether remotely or in-person, connecting the dots globally and overcoming obstacles; Gives and receives frequent feedback, learns, teaches, encourages information sharing and cooperation among teams; Celebrates the individual and the team; Ability to clearly communicate.        Collaborative        Communicates the big picture whether remotely or in-person, connecting the dots globally and overcoming obstacles; Gives and receives frequent feedback, learns, teaches, encourages information sharing and cooperation among teams; Celebrates the individual and the team; Ability to clearly communicate.        Looks Beyond Oneself        (Team Leader) Demonstrates humility through servant leadership by thinking about what can I do as a leader to help you achieve your goals; Develops a vision (strategy) and sets goals and targets, fostering an environment which encourages achievement; Inspires and influences people to work together cohesively and enthusiastically engages with them; Welcomes a diversity of backgrounds and ideas; Values Distributors and teammates.        Drives Innovation        Add value through: Driving opportunities for all 3 types of innovation (incremental, evolutionary or disruptive); Proposing ideas and creative solutions to employee, distributor and/or customer challenges; Celebrating and learning from failures and successes, willing to experiment and take educated risks making decisions based on facts & data; Welcoming other s ideas and suggestions and acting on them.        Delivers Change        Delivers Change Through: Experiencing and leading change; Understanding Herbalife Nutrition s business; Creating a sense of urgency for delivering business benefits; Flexibility and openness to change.          Qualifications        Please review EMEA&I Description box

column2: The Program Manager / Scrum master will manage simple to complex projects or phases of a project to ensure the completion of milestones within budget, tracks performance and progress of project against committed timeline.          Projects could be NPD, Agile, NTP, Productivity, RTS or QR type.         This role calls for collaboration with cross functional multi-location teams to ensure that the projects are accomplished to a high quality, adhering to our standard processes, systems and project management principles, while remaining aligned with strategy and goals of the organization.          The Associate program manager/Scrum will also manage project portfolio/project agreements of the respective ETC teams.               Resolves unique problems that could occur during the project to minimize delays provide timely status updates to the executive leadership team            Core Job Responsibilities:                     Fulfill the role of the Program Manager | Scrum Master and all that it entails             Understand project requirements, collaborate with project owners, leaders cross functional teams across the globe for delivery of projects, by adhering to standard processes, systems and project management principles.             Ensure the completion of project milestones/deliverables within committed Quality (Q), Delivery (D), Project cost (C) Product cost (C), track performance and progress of project against committed QDC targets             Serve the Product Owner, the Development Team, and the Organization as described in the Scrum Guide TM              Ensure the development team is following established product development procedures and practices to leverage shared organizational knowledge and experience.             Radiate information to promote Scrum Team accountability and continuous improvement             Adhere to general project management principles of Project scope management, time management, cost management, risk management and stakeholder management             Lead/Assist Annual Operating Planning (AOP) discussions with respective SBUs/NOEs and corporate teams             Report out project updates, risks and mitigations, productivity updates, QDC metrics, deployment efficiency, timesheet data, during the monthly Operations review meeting with ETC leadership team             Collaborate with PMO team members to continuously improve process, systems and develop/refine standard works.             Project management of Strategic organization initiatives, deployment of BOS and coaching project teams             Manage ETC PPM project portfolio / Project agreements of respective teams and publish the monthly billing data for the respective teams.             Host monthly calibration meetings and publish monthly QDC metrics for the respective teams.                  Key Competencies:             Expertise in    project management / Agile methodologies Scrum / Kanban / Scaled Agile               Proven leadership, coaching and mentoring skills with exceptional attention to detail.             Self-starter with a desire to make a significant impact on the product development process.             Ability to drive program specific goals and actions to closure .             Develops and manages projects budgets, schedules timelines             Demonstrated ability to work with all levels of management             Understands the impact of a project to the overall business.             Leads from the front, coaches project team members, takes initiative and effects change.             Being bold and Courageous to raise issues to upper management.             Demonstrate patience during challenging circumstances.             Excellent written and oral communication and facilitation skills.             Good Interpersonal skills. Ability to learn and collaborate with cross cultural project teams.             Exceptional Influencing skills as project team members will not be one s direct reports.             Manages resolves conflicts.         Technically competent with Microsoft Office tools and JIRA                      Minimum Qualifications   :               4-year degree from an accredited institution. Technical degree in engineering or computer science preferred.             10 - 18 years of overall functional experience             PMP certified project management professional or Certified Scrum Master (CSM + A-CSM, or CSP, PSM) with    5+ yrs. of Project management / Scrum Master experience.

column2: Nature of Job:    Remote        Job Summary        Program Manager-Development QA is responsible for enabling and iterating the Device Development QA/Design Control process with the Digital Medicine device group throughout all phases of development life cycle, from the requirements phase to the design phase to the validation phase. Will work as an integral member of a cross-functional team to ensure that device development process meets high-quality expectations for the company s medical device manufacturing and quality system.        Job Description          Work with engineers and other development team members throughout the development process to ensure compliance with design controls for device manufacturing tool development.      Define and implement QA best practices to ensure products are developed and implemented with quality-built-in per design control process. column2: Supports and aligns efforts to meet customer and business needs.     Manages relationships and expectations by communicating regularly with stakeholders on project status and results.     Stays current with business needs and strategies; utilizes formal and informal written communication methods (i.e. emails, newsletters, PowerPoint presentations, executive updates, task lists) to communicate updates and findings related to business processes and/or systems; facilitates project meetings and presentations to diverse audiences (i.e. senior management, end-users, technical staff)     Completes and regularly updates project documentation; manages project scope; adjusts project schedules when necessary; determines daily priorities; ensures efficient and on-time delivery of project tasks and milestones; follows proper escalation paths; and manages relationships with stakeholders. Supports system conversions, upgrades, and enhancement. Advanced-level software implementation project management processes     Strong communication (written and oral), organization, and interpersonal skills     Advanced analytical acumen with the ability to translate data, to insights, to action.     Advanced presentation skills     Advanced experience with Microsoft Office programs (e.g. PowerPoint, Word, Excel, MS Project)     Experience successfully leading small to medium IT projects and/or in business/IT consulting/management roles.     Requires leadership and negotiation skills and experience/in-depth knowledge of the business requirements analysis and IT processes.     Business knowledge - strong background in various business functions and operations     Language skills: English is required, other languages are a plus.     Ability to work autonomously.           Preferred           Certification as a Project Manager through PMI (Project Management Institute)     Budget Management - Intermediate Level     Experience working with projects implementing SaaS solutions.     Experience with project and program management software.               Education           Bachelor s degree (IT or Computer Science focus preferred) or equivalent work experience.               Core Competencies            Project Management     Functional Business Knowledge     Customer Focus     Business Acumen     Resource Management     Reporting     Vendor Management     Negotiation Skills     Contract Knowledge     Emerging Technology Trends     Industry and Organizational Awareness

column2: Microsoft ToDo, Planner and Project Online are part of the Microsoft 365 offerings for Modern Workplace. The team is providing these Services and other Microsoft 365 Services globally to ~70.000 users. Task Management in Microsoft 365 will become more and more popular on our way to a digital company.     As Product Owner (m / f / diverse) of Microsoft Task Management which includes the Services Microsoft ToDo, Planner and Project Online, you are responsible for translating the requirements in this area into system requirements.       Task and Responsibilities                 End-to-end ownership for IT services around M365 Task Management, close cooperation with the business and other internal IT service teams and architects, ensuring the operation of IT services.         Consulting and support for the implementation of new projects and solutions, changes to existing services, analysis of new business requirements to increase productivity in the business units.         As part of new developments, you are responsible for the product / service backlog within a Scrum team. During the implementation, you will work closely with business stakeholders (eg business owners, key users) and with external partners.         You coordinate the operation of the IT services used by SHS IT internally, ie you analyze, monitor and coordinate service changes.         You will work with the stakeholders to set up business solutions and ensure that these solutions fit into the business strategy and meet the expected goals.         You will drive the further harmonization of IT services for internal communication and assess the migration of existing solutions into the Siemens Healthineers IT service landscape.         In addition, you are responsible for compliance with the Q, ISEQ and DP regulations.       Required Education, Experience and Knowledge/Skills             You are exactly the right person for this position if you are interested in healthcare and want to support internal IT in introducing integrated solutions for the area of collaboration.         You have a degree in computer science or business administration or have acquired a comparable qualification.         You have professional experience in IT and in managing international projects and / or international applications.         You have a project management background/ knowledge and can consult the business in Task management and in setting up projects in Project Online.         You must be proficient (at least 3 years of experience) around Microsoft ToDo, Planner and Project Online and other Microsoft services like SharePoint Online or Dataverse and must be able to demonstrate sound functional understanding of the above Services.         You have in-depth knowledge in user adoption including training, change management and coaching or consulting.         With your analytical and methodical skills, you manage the product backlog with global requirements and consider dependencies.         As an excellent team player with a strong focus on the (internal) customer you communicate and work effectively in a multi-cultural environment. You must possess the ability to collaborate remotely with the functional teams in Germany and the USA.         You are a self-starter, capable of working with very little supervision and can take initiative, with a firm understanding of the final goal to be achieved.

column2: Position :  Business Analyst - AI/ML Team (Tele-law) Location: New Delhi, Delhi 110020 Company: R&D at CSC e-Governance Services India Ltd Are you an experienced Project Manager with a strong background in AI/ML and a passion for driving impactful projects in the Tele-law domain? Do you excel in leading multidisciplinary teams towards achieving ambitious goals in research and technology development? If so, we invite you to join our dynamic R&D team at CSC, a pioneering initiative of the Ministry of Electronics & IT Government of India, dedicated to transforming India's digital landscape. Job Description: We are actively seeking a Project Manager to lead our AI/ML team focused on Tele-law services. As a key member of our team, you will oversee and coordinate the planning, execution, and delivery of projects aimed at leveraging AI/ML technologies to enhance access to justice and legal assistance for marginalized communities. This role provides an exciting opportunity to combine your project management skills with expertise in AI/ML to drive innovation and social impact in the Tele-law domain. Minimum Requirements:  A minimum of 5 years of professional experience in project management, with a focus on AI/ML or related technologies.  Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Business Administration, or a related field.  Full-time availability. Qualifications and Skills:  Proven experience in managing complex projects from initiation to completion, with a track record of delivering results on time and within budget.  Excellent leadership and team management skills, with the ability to motivate and guide multidisciplinary teams towards achieving common goals.  Strong communication and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to effectively communicate project status, risks, and issues to senior management and stakeholders.  Proficiency in project management tools and methodologies, with experience in Agile and/or Waterfall methodologies.  Experience in the Tele-law domain or legal services is a significant plus.  PMP, PRINCE2, or equivalent project management certification is desirable. Key Responsibilities:  Lead the planning, execution, and delivery of AI/ML projects focused on enhancing Tele-law services, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and objectives.  Define project scope, objectives, and deliverables in collaboration with stakeholders, and develop detailed project plans to guide project execution.  Allocate resources, including personnel, budget, and equipment, to ensure successful project implementation and delivery.  Monitor project progress, track milestones, and manage risks and issues, taking proactive measures to address challenges and ensure project success.  Foster a collaborative and inclusive team culture, encouraging knowledge sharing, innovation, and continuous improvement.  Act as a liaison between the AI/ML team, senior management, and external stakeholders, providing regular updates on project status, risks, and opportunities.  Ensure compliance with relevant regulations, standards, and best practices in AI/ML project management and Tele-law services.  Contribute to the development of project proposals, budgets, and funding applications to support the growth and expansion of AI/ML initiatives in the Tele-law domain.

column2: Job Overview: The IT Infrastructure Project Coordinator role within our organization is responsible for coordinating and overseeing assigned IT infrastructure projects from inception to completion. Project Management : Manage and oversee IT infrastructure projects, including planning, execution, tracking, and closure. Risk Management : Identify potential risks and issues that could impact project success. Develop and implement strategies to mitigate these risks. Familiarity with cloud computing technologies, with a preference for AWS. Experience with Kanban methodologies. Strong analytical skills and attention to detail. Excellent communication skills. Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines. Must be a motivated self-starter. Experience with ServiceNow, Splunk, or Rally preferred. Experience with IT Networking and Security projects is preferred. Ability to use a computer for extended periods of time. This position requires working hours that overlap with our US-based office. Benefits: Fully work from home opportunity Salary more than industry average

column1: Deputy Dean - E-Governance (For University - Education Sector)
column2: Role Overview: As the Deputy Dean - eGovernance, you will be at the forefront of advancing digital technologies and governance systems within our esteemed university in Bengaluru, Karnataka. Reporting directly to the Chief Technology Officer, you will lead the integration of e-governance initiatives to enhance operational efficiency, transparency, and stakeholder engagement. Key Responsibilities: 1.  Strategic Leadership : Collaborate closely with university leadership to develop and execute a comprehensive e-governance strategy aligned with our institution's mission and objectives. 2.  Policy Development : Formulate and enforce policies governing the utilization of digital platforms and technologies, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards and industry best practices. 3.  Systems Integration : Oversee the seamless integration of e-governance systems with existing university databases, student information systems, and administrative platforms. 4.  Technology Implementation : Assess, select, and implement suitable software solutions to streamline administrative workflows, student enrollment, assessment, and other critical processes. 5.  Data Security : Establish robust data security protocols to safeguard sensitive information and ensure adherence to data protection regulations. 6.  Capacity Building : Provide comprehensive training and support to university staff, faculty, and administrators to enhance their proficiency in utilizing e-governance systems effectively. 7.  Stakeholder Engagement : Foster collaboration with internal and external stakeholders to gather feedback, address requirements, and promote widespread adoption of e-governance solutions. 8.  Performance Monitoring : Develop and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to evaluate the effectiveness of e-governance initiatives and drive continuous improvement. 9.  Budget Management : Take ownership of budget planning and management for e-governance projects, optimizing resource allocation and tracking expenditures effectively. 10.  Research and Innovation : Stay abreast of emerging trends and technologies in e-governance and higher education administration, driving innovation and thought leadership within the university. Qualifications: Master's degree or higher in Computer Science, Information Technology, Public Administration, or a related field. Minimum of 5 years of experience in e-governance, digital transformation, or IT leadership roles within the education sector or government organizations. Proven track record of successfully implementing e-governance initiatives, preferably in a higher education setting. Strong understanding of e-governance frameworks, data management principles, and information security standards. Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse stakeholders. Demonstrated project management expertise, including planning, execution, and monitoring of complex initiatives. Knowledge of relevant laws, regulations, and standards governing e-governance, privacy, and data protection. Application Process: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interviews.

column2: We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented technology leader having experience in Release Management, Production Support and Technology Governance to join our dynamic technology team.      ?       The responsibilities include:       Overseeing & governing the release process     Ensuring smooth & efficient release of business requirements     The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of managing releases in a fast-paced environment.       Develop and maintain release plans, schedules, and timelines.     Coordinate release activities across multiple teams, including development, quality assurance, Information Security and Change Management.     Collaborate with Tech Leads to define release scope, objectives, and success criteria.     Conduct risk assessments and develop mitigation strategies to minimize impact on release schedules.     Manage release communication, including status updates, release notes, and post-release evaluations.     Implement and improve release processes to increase efficiency and reliability.     Monitor release metrics and KPIs to measure performance and identify areas for improvement.     Serve as a point of contact for release-related issues and escalations, coordinating resolution with cross-functional teams.         Implement and maintain monitoring tools and systems to proactively detect and respond to issues in production environments, ensuring optimal performance and availability.     Identify the areas of optimization based on the performance.     Lead the resolution of production issues and incidents, including prioritization, escalation, and coordination with relevant teams to minimize downtime and impact on users.     Define and monitor service level agreements (SLAs) and key performance indicators (KPIs) for production support activities, ensuring adherence to agreed-upon service levels.     Identify recurring or systemic issues affecting production systems and lead efforts to address root causes and prevent future occurrences.     Maintain comprehensive documentation of production systems, processes, and procedures, and facilitate knowledge sharing among team members to improve efficiency and effectiveness.     Identify opportunities for process improvements and automation to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of production support activities. column2: A PMO Manager for IT Services Delivery is a crucial role within an organization that focuses on overseeing and optimizing the delivery of IT services and projects. This role ensures that IT projects are executed efficiently, align with business objectives, and meet quality standards. Heres a job description for a PMO Manager in IT services delivery:                 Job Summary:       The PMO Manager for IT Services Delivery is responsible for leading the IT Project Management Office (PMO), ensuring the successful planning, execution, and delivery of IT projects and services. This role plays a vital part in optimizing IT processes, resource allocation, and project governance to drive IT service excellence and alignment with organizational goals.               Key Responsibilities:         IT Project Portfolio Management:             Assess, prioritize, and manage the IT project portfolio.         Ensure alignment of IT projects with business objectives and strategic plans.         Monitor and report on project portfolio performance.               Resource Management:             Allocate and manage IT project resources, including personnel, budget, and technology assets.         Optimize resource allocation to maximize efficiency and ROI.               Project Governance:             Establish and enforce project governance frameworks, tools, methodologies, and standards.         Review current processes and establish guidelines.         Develop Metrics and benchmarks.         Develop and implement strategies for enhancing project quality and efficiency.         Ensuring projects comply with best practices and SOPs.               IT Service Quality Assurance:             Implement and oversee IT service quality assurance and control processes.         Ensure that IT services meet defined quality standards and service level agreements (SLAs).               Stakeholder Communication:             Facilitate communication among IT stakeholders, including executives, project teams, and clients.         Provide regular status reports and updates to senior management.               Risk Management:             Identify and assess IT project and service risks.         Develop risk mitigation strategies and contingency plans.         Monitor and report on IT project and service risks throughout the lifecycle.               Performance Measurement and Improvement:             Define key performance indicators (KPIs) for IT service delivery.         Continuously monitor and evaluate IT project and service performance.         Implement process improvements based on lessons learned.               Qualifications:             Bachelors degree in information technology, computer science, or a related field (Masters degree preferred).         Project Management Professional (PMP) or relevant certifications (e.g., ITIL, CSM).         Proven experience in IT project management and IT service delivery.         Strong leadership and interpersonal skills.         Excellent communication and negotiation abilities.         Proficiency in project management and IT service management tools.         Knowledge of IT industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices.               Experience:             5-8 years experience as PMO Manager for IT Services Delivery would have several years of experience in IT project management, including experience in managing IT service delivery and leading a PMO team.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with proficiency in handling large datasets and making data-driven decisions. column2: Role & responsibilities     Associate Director / Director Incedo is a US based consulting, analytics and technology services firm incorporated in 2011. We are Head quartered out of New Jersey with 5000+ employees based globally out of the offices in New Jersey, California, Gurgaon, Pune, Bangalore and Chennai, Hyderabad As a Firm we have been helping our clients achieve competitive advantage through End-to-End Digital Transformation and work across Financial Services, Telecom, Life Science & Healthcare and Product Engineering sectors. Our uniqueness lies in bringing together strong engineering, data science and design capabilities with deep domain understanding, and blurring the boundaries between services and products to maximize business impact from emerging technologies. Our Mission is to enable our clients to maximize business impact from technology by Harnessing the transformational impact of emerging technologies Bridging the gap between business and technology. And become an employer of choice by being employee first in all processes and practices. Overview of the Role ??Technical Project Manager Location: Hyderabad Role Description -:  Recruit and mentor a balanced team of developers who are highly skilled and passionate about development.  Responsible for Project Planning, executing, controlling, closure of projects, creation of teams and cost effective project delivery.  Managing team of Developers/Designers/Testers. Leading and driving the team for better performance, performing Resource Planning & utilization (allocation/release, ramp up/ramp down), Capacity Planning (effort management), Performance Management (review / Appraisals) and using management tools. Managing projects in fast paced agile ecosystem and ensuring quality deliverables within stringent timelines Responsible for Risk Management, maintaining the Risk documentation and mitigations plan.  Client management, Effective communication to identify customer needs and evaluate alternative business solution, managing day to day customer interaction (driving Projects status meetings with customer and multiple stakeholders of the projects), built a trust by delivering a quality product towards client needs and expectations in timely manner and have been receiving further businesses/project extensions without any bidding process.  Collaboration Management across the department to broadening the skills and cross functional delivery management.  Responsible for architecture design and review.  Publishing project metrics dashboard to internal and external stakeholder.  Publishing weekly and monthly status reports.  Own and enforce high quality development practices and procedures, as well as maintaining secure coding standards, through the adoption of test-driven development (TDD), paired programming, peer code reviews, and software build automation.  Provide oversight and guidance to team members during regular technical activities within an Agile environment: including (but not limited to) code reviews, estimating, technical solution design & architecture, testing.  Drive continuous improvement in a Lean/Agile environment, implementing DevOps delivery approaches encompassing CI/CD, build automation and deployments. and external vendors as necessary.  Effectively communicate Qualifications and Abilities:  BE/B.Tech Graduate in Electronics/Computer Science with 10+ years of relevant experience including minimum of 10 years in Program management in IT services in Telecom Sector. Experience in Network IT would be an added advantage.  Experience in Full-Stack technologies (Java, Springboot, Microservices, Angular/React JS, Node JS,Postgres), AWS/MS Cloud migration, Collaboration Tools, Dev Ops and Automated Testing is essential  Accelerate customer Business Transformation by leveraging customer needs and technical Innovations  Able to establish standard development practices and processes. Involvement in project planning -forecast, monitor, and review all project aspects along with costs, operational budgets, staffing requirements, resources, and risk.  Optimize customer releases based on user experience program  Able to Motivate team player with ability to work under minimal supervision following Servant- Leadership Model.  Easily grasp the new technologies and updated as well.  Deep knowledge of the web application development ecosystem, tooling, methodologies, and best practices.  Understanding of Java application stacks and JavaScript frameworks.  Hands-on in scrum methodology (Sprint planning, execution and retrospection) Project Related Process Expectations:  Responsible for ensuring that the Scrum Team is following the Scrum practices and lives by the Agile Values Coach to the team  Consider as a trainer, provides motivation  Reminds the goals and keeps them on your radar  Helps to adopt modern development techniques  Helps to identify skills gap and recommend trainings  Process Owner and not the Team Owner, Task master  Can recommend changes to the processes  Can be reached out to suggest changes in the processes  Helps to improve productivity  Highlighting impediments, supporting team to resolve impediments  Helps in prioritization (day to day execution)  Facilitates meetings  Works with the key stakeholders  Protects the team Acts as the development team's escalation point to other IT functions, as well as to internal business partners Acts as the development team's escalation point to other IT functions, as well as to internal business partners. column2: In charge of Multiple STEM Activity Centres,  Ensuring Effectiveness of Courses,  Training Mentoring Educators,  Collaborating with Sales,  Marketing,  and Logistics,  Curriculum Pedagogy Development Upgradation  Education Program Manager - Fundoo Labs Education Program Manager February 16,  2017 Full Time,  Vadodara     Who are we   Fundoo Labs Creative Learning LLP is an innovative education start-up offering hands-on activities/ experiments in the field of science,  technology,  engineering,  and mathematics (STEM) to school kids. We strongly believe that quality of life of every individual (and thus,  the quality of country and its future) depends on their skills. The prime intention of Fundoo Labs is to enhance STEM skills of our next generation to make it most creative and innovative task force.  We are looking for the people who are passionate for bridging scientific skill gap by changing the way of learning Science,  Technology,  Engineering,  and Mathematics.   Why Do we need you   As an Education Program Manager,  you are expected to shoulder following responsibilities   Primary responsibility to ensure STEM activity centers (allocated to you) are successful in delivering skills to our ultimate customers the students  Assisting development of Curriculum,  Pedagogies,  and Experiment Models.  Training and Mentoring Educators/ Teachers  Anticipating and Solving Operational Roadblocks that come in a way of successful implementation of STEM programs  Managing stakeholders expectation (Centre Franchisee,  Parents,  and Students)  Adding value to the company by collaborating with sales,  marketing,  and logistics to find ways to improve the service/ product of Fundoo Labs.   Criteria for Joining Us   The job,  in a nutshell,  is to ensure that the program runs successfully in your STEM centers. This would involve a fair amount of communication,  collaboration,  initiative,  adaptability,  thinking skills,  and a do-or-die attitude. If you show us that you have these skills,  that you get a kick out of creating a success,  we would love to hire you. The criteria for hiring are:   Passion for bringing a change in our education system  Work experience for a minimum of 2 years (Academic or Non-Academic)  A Bachelors or Masters Degree in any Science/  Technical/  Managerial Stream  Wherever you come from,  you need to show us that you have the skills that we require.   Note: We offer a competitive compensation package that will be tailored to suit the degree and experience.

Roles & Responsibilities of (Associate) Delivery Head: Delivery Management: Responsible for the service delivery on the services team is delivering Responsible for delivery of Projects / Programs under his / her portfolio Responsible for the Production support and bug fixing activities Responsible for Stakeholder Management and achieve high customer satisfaction Support the Project Managers and Delivery Managers in the project / program delivery Ensuring that everyone in the team knows and executes his or her role in the service delivery Responsible for cost / budget management Reporting on project status to stakeholders Introduce best practices within the team to maximize the teams productivity Change Management Leadership Go getter and Lead by example Lead employees to meet the organization's expectations for productivity, quality, and goal accomplishment. Achieve stretched goals through inspirational leadership Applies significant knowledge of industry trends and developments to improve services of the team Creates and executes development plans and revises as appropriate to meet changing needs and requirements. As a part of Middle Management, responsible for making team level decisions, and implement the same in efficient and effective way. Organize the team, making it efficient and effective, and ensure there is constant improvement in internal and external collaboration processes. Considers organizational values, employee's expertise and past contributions, and opportunities for development when delegating assignments Be a catalyst in implementing our Colruyt values in the organization. People Development People management for a team of 10 - 20 members from juniors to senior level. Responsible for indicating a direction in the short run so that it is clear for everybody which way we are heading and to make sure we are all on the same wavelength. Responsible for mobilising and channelling the energy of employees and colleagues to make sure everybody is committed to reach the objectives set. Responsible for coaching and following the personnel so that each individual and the team have the space to grow (SKILL). Responsible for team member?? personal development to become stronger and more conscious. Responsible for short-term planning and organization, so that people as well as means are brought into action in the most efficient way. Responsible for his/her own presence and availability so that employees have a personal contact for their needs and for taking on the role as a superior. Responsible for promoting the (group) mission and values so that the team can understand the reasons, co-ownership is brought about and the team members understands and follows group culture Responsible for following and adjusting the work so that we, as a service, comply with the SLEs agreed on with the customer in the total process. Responsible for all staffing decisions in the team (Recruitment, Induction, Performance Appraisal, Release etc.) Engage, Energize, Evaluate and Empower team members Communication & collaboration Responsible for the synergy with other teams (in India and Belgium) and directions, so that the team contributes significantly to the global process. Identifying and resolving problems, determining quality improvements and implementing change. Shares information with team through frequent, open, quality, two-way communication with a sense of direction. What are the expectations from you? Total experience of 15+ years in Application Development and Maintenance activities Have at least 5 years of project / program delivery experience in Waterfall / Agile methodologies Have at least 3 years of experience in core people management Experience in handling technical teams of 15+ people Experience in managing cross functional teams including analysts, architects, software engineers, QA etc Experience in managing vendors and their deliverables Experience in managing teams in global working model in onsite ??offshore model Strong in stakeholder management and building trust relationships with the clients Good experience in ITIL practices is preferred Be a believer of values and have necessary soft skills (respect for individual, active listening, cost/benefit thinking, little ??ierarchical thinking?? service oriented, efficiency). A role model in these areas You like to work with people and extract best out of them. You find your satisfaction in the growth of people. Very good in situational leadership You can take quick, but thoughtful decisions You are not simply an executer of "assignments" but somebody who sees opportunities and takes initiatives and develops vision You're a pusher who can make ideas come true in reality You can inspire/motivate people to reach results You are strong in organization / coordination of projects and daily operations You are social and you build easily professional relationships with people of all levels and departments in the organization What qualification we??e looking for? B.E/B.Tech, MCA or equivalent technical degree

column2: WHO YOU ARE:       A leader who is ready to work with a diverse set of Executive leaders, Senior Leaders and stakeholders in a forward-thinking organization that is always pushing boundaries. Here, you will take end-to-end ownership of workforce management across the entire organization. Our ideal candidate should have experience planning, execution and governance of strategic plans and strategies.       WHAT YOU LL DO:       You will be responsible for working with executive and business line leaders to identify and frame strategic issues and opportunities to optimize our resource alignment to client delivery and capital investments, and develop corresponding solutions for related forecasting, reporting and management.     Build and optimize a Project Management Office Administration function to support:     Reconciliation of budget to actuals by client in support of weekly and monthly reconciliation     Reconciliation of Estimate at Completion by all client s projects, programs, portfolio     Troubleshoot anomalies in time entry reported across all client s projects, programs, portfolio     Identify, develop, and implement processes and procedures and controls   Establish policies and procedures for all relevant resources to record resource time and escalating non-compliance within the organization.     Refine controls for time entry accuracy, timeliness     Develop and implement methods for efficient follow up for lagging time tracking submissions, approvals     Oversee and manage the administration of OpenAir software supporting the full project delivery lifecycle including planning, resourcing, budgeting, activity tracking and billing.     Responsible for suggesting ideas, implementing improvements and necessary fixes, and overall maintenance tasks to support administration of OpenAir     Collaborate with cross functional teams to     Support proactive management of budget to actuals by team across projects, programs and portfolios     Build reports, leverage tools (OpenAir, JIRA) to increase ease of use for visibility of hours by project / program and department     Responsible for management of end to end workforce support across Zinnia.     Oversee and manage the administration of OpenAir software which supports the full project delivery lifecycle including planning, resourcing, budgeting, activity tracking and billing.      You will learn how to use the system from end-to-end, and be able to provide ideas on improvements and fixes along with overseeing a team that maintains it   Resource Management     Refine Zinnia portfolio level visibility by department and resource level based on existing and projected demand     Define views to project department level capacity     Refine views / visibility by client, department, resource type for weekly resource capacity     Refine views to support forecasting of projected demand beyond committed work across department, resource type     Collaborate to refine prioritization methodology for strategic program staffing and unplanned work     Deliver and advance workforce management metrics and analytics.     Establish views for utilization and detailed breakout of time reported across billable, non billable, capital expenditure programs     Establish weekly, monthly, quarterly, annual actuals to budget views, proactive forecasting model (working with Finance)     Advise Executive / senior leadership in making strategic decisions regarding company culture, policies, procedures, and resources.     Assist in developing and finalizing presentations for senior and executive management.     Ability to collaborate, motivate peers and team members that are not direct line reports to achieve organizational goals.     Support the execution of the strategic plans, including long-term goals, medium term goals, and short-term objectives.     Build out and manage a globally-distributed workforce management team of 2-4 associates       WHAT YOU LL NEED:       10-12+ years experience in strategy, business consulting and program management.     Proven track record of delivering timely and accurate completion of multiple strategic initiatives occurring simultaneously.     Proven track record of building and managing a team focused on workforce management     Hands on experience in the area of workforce management, change management, program management and business transformation.     Experience managing matrixed teams and achieving results through influence     Experience in a Tech / Product company will be an added advantage.     Excellent stakeholder management skills.     High degree of flexibility and strong collaboration skills.     Proven ability to translate business strategies into action plans.     Result orientation with strong analytical skills and problem-solving capabilities     Excellent verbal and written communication skills

column2: Roles and Responsibilities     As the IT In Charge of a project-based SAW Pipe manufacturing company with multiple locations, your role would involve strategic planning, multi-site IT infra management, Enable Prepare Business Blue Print, ERP implementation, data management, cybersecurity, collaboration solutions, and vendor management. By leveraging technology effectively, you would aim to enhance operational efficiency, optimize project management, and support the overall growth and success of the company. Some key aspects of your role are: Develop and implement the company's IT strategy, Business Blue Print; ensuring systems alignment with business goals  Oversee the design, implementation, and management of the IT infrastructure across different factory locations, offices and Head Office, including networks, servers, storage systems, and connectivity solutions. Company is Currently using Navision for its day to day requirement, however would evaluate SAP implementation for enterprise ERP solution  You will lead the selection, customization, and integration of an appropriate ERP system to streamline project management, supply chain coordination, and inventory control across factories. Deploy and maintain a Manufacturing Excellence System (MES) to monitor production processes, track project progress, and optimize resource utilization. Establish data management policies, data governance frameworks, and analytics capabilities to ensure effective data utilization for decision-making and process improvement. Implement robust cybersecurity measures to protect the company's IT assets, including firewalls, intrusion detection systems, access controls, and regular security audits. Facilitate seamless collaboration and communication across factory locations and project teams by implementing and managing collaboration tools and communication platforms. Manage relationships with IT vendors and service providers, including hardware and software vendors, cloud service providers, and IT consultants. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards, establish IT governance frameworks, conduct risk assessments, and ensure data privacy and security. Lead and develop the IT team, providing mentorship, guidance, and performance management to foster a high-performing and motivated team. Qualifications & Experience: B.E/ B. Tech in Computer Science/ IT, or a related field (Master's degree preferred). 20 year Proven experience in IT. Heading IT in a project-based manufacturing company for minimum 5 years. Desired Candidate Profile: Strong understanding of project management principles and processes within a manufacturing environment. In-depth knowledge of IT infrastructure, systems, and software, including ERP and Manufacturing excellence System. Proficient in data management, cybersecurity, and analytics. Experience in multi-site IT infrastructure management and coordination. Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. As a Project Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing and executing various ERP projects from initiation to completion. This role requires exceptional leadership skills, problem-solving abilities, and a strong understanding of project management methodologies.   The project manager will work closely with client stakeholders throughout the delivery of the ERP. Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and budgets in collaboration with the project team. Coordinate and communicate project objectives, expectations, and deliverables to team members and stakeholders. Conduct project reviews and post-implementation evaluations to identify areas of improvement and lessons learned. Drive continuous improvement initiatives to increase organizational efficiency and effectiveness. Strong knowledge of project management methodologies, tools, and techniques. 3+ years of professional Scrum Master experience Experience in onsite, remote and virtual team management. Excellent leadership and team management skills. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills. Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities. Attention to detail and ability to prioritize and manage multiple teams simultaneously.

column2: Enphase Energy is a global energy technology company and leading provider of solar, battery, and electric vehicle charging products. Founded in 2006, Enphase transformed the solar industry with our revolutionary microinverter technology, which turns sunlight into a safe, reliable, resilient, and scalable source of energy to power our lives. Today, the Enphase Energy System helps people make, use, save, and sell their own power. Enphase is also one of the fastest growing and innovative clean energy companies in the world, with approximately 68 million products installed across more than 145 countries. We are building teams that are designing, developing, and manufacturing next-generation energy technologies and our work environment is fast-paced, fun and full of exciting new projects. If you are passionate about advancing a more sustainable future, this is the perfect time to join Enphase! About the role: Enphase is looking for?a dynamic,?experienced?Program?Manager?to?drive some of our upcoming System projects. In this position, you will develop, manage, and drive the end-to-end execution of?complex programs (complete product development lifecycle and delivery stages). You will lead and deliver complex Systems, working closely with various internal and external stakeholders to establish project plans, risk management plans, project milestones and deliverables. You will also be involved in defining project resources, managing the integration of various components of the project including hardware, software, testing, business process review, redesign, application development, financial and costing. You are required to work cohesively with your team members to ensure that all tasks and deliverables are completed according to schedule, budget and quality.? Maintain an orientation toward teamwork and collaboration.? Ensure product?requirements are clearly defined. Break down complex software/hardware issues into simple tasks Develop and oversee comprehensive project plans. Identify and handle program cross-functional dependencies between teams Communicate development milestones, project schedules and status updates and drive alignment across the organization and between teams Coordinate with teams to identify, prioritize and track risks to schedule and product quality Drive System readiness in support of key project milestones (Alpha, Beta etc) Coordinate multiple validation cycles (System level) plans across teams Maintain an orientation toward teamwork and collaboration Provide regular program status updates and communicate escalations as needed to executive team What you will do: You are a highly engaged and self-driven project professional with incredible sense of ownership with the ability to drive project with minimal supervision. You have proven experience of managing both large complex projects and programs, budgets and justifying resource needs to senior management team. column2: As part of GCCX, the Business Technology Solutions Manager will work across the region to provide leadership, coordination, and execution of key strategic initiatives, with focus on driving innovation and adoption of Remote Business Solutions and Virtual & digital platforms, increasing reach, enhancing customer experience and field productivity         The Business Technology Solutions Manager will serve as the bridge between business objectives and technology capabilities     Will collaborate with various departments and external partners on behalf of our business units to ensure that technology solutions align with business goals, are delivered efficiently, and drive meaningful value       The role will lead the deployment and acceleration of new Remote Business solutions & platforms such as Smart Glass technology, digital customer engagement platforms, Omni channels, productivity improvement solutions like Sales loft, CRM etc     , to expand customer reach, increase efficiency and profitability       This role will be business partner for commercial organization to develop, implement and execute strategies for transition to alternate sales and service engagement channels     Design infrastructure, systems and processes for alternate Sales and Service channels to constantly improve customer experience, satisfaction, and loyalty       This role will be responsible to execute targeted pilots with field proximity, will ensure clear assessment of best solutions and will prepare scaling-up and efficiencies with central contract negotiations     Successful execution will involve consolidating infrastructure, ensure security approvals and compliance to privacy regulations     The role will drive the commercialization, launches and expansion, evolving into multiple service models to drive customer engagement, quality of service and Medtronic profitability       Liaison across commercial organizations & regional COE s to plan and build technical infrastructures, upgrade / scaleup platforms with global IT which enable to achieve customer centric operations, centralized voice collection, remote customer care/service solution creation and seamless digital care engagement with internal and external stakeholders             Main Job Duties/Responsibilities:               1.                   Define solution strategy, Business model, OU engagement.                             Build and reinforce the business solution vision & strategic roadmap; Define business model options, define, and implement ways to charge the service, ensure ROI.                          Engage OU, assess needs and drive fit into OU strategies.                2.                   Coordinate Pilot, Ensure field proximity.                             Work in collaboration with the OU to coordinate remote solutions pilots, identify best options, scale-up.                          Interpret business strategy and determine technology solutions required for implementation.                          Connect existing remote solutions across APAC, leverage knowledge already acquired and help fill in the gaps within programs offered by different operating units.                          Negotiate contracts centrally.                          Form teams locally, develop and engage TC / Sales evolve to centralized models by quick learning and adapt to market need.                3.                   Consolidate infrastructure, Ensure Privacy & GSO approvals.                             Interact with global teams for accelerating solutions and be the voice with Global IT                          Ensure privacy and GSO approvals are secured.                          Structure the supply model, ensure service and repair where required.                4.                   Execute Launch, integrate into OU plans.                             Work with OU to build and execute launch plans, including Customer Targeting, support model, funding, ROI, OU Engagement                          Develop launch materials and training modules, ensure teams readiness and confidence.                          Accelerate access to Medtronic trainings by developing new remote technologies that can be adopted to existing training programs.                          Drive innovation within the overall remote interactions with HCPs and partner with geographies on adoption.                          Secure and allocate funding through the OU.                          Monitor and track remote solutions training adoption by operating units.                          Track and increase Customer experience; Share progresses and productivity reporting to management.                5.                   Innovate, expand adoption and Use cases.                             Expand potential use cases to multiple remote models, as remote case support, remote proctoring, remote T&E, remote Service & Repair, Digital customer engagement, working with the relevant internal partners to develop programs and readiness.                          Lead the technology development required for new remote training programs and liaise with business and T&E lead.                          Explore remote technologies that have not been introduced health care and work on the adoption e.g., VR, AR, simulation and gamification etc.                          Expand to multiple virtual service model, drive service transformation culture.                          Track competition, advance, position innovation              Key Competencies:                              Strong technical knowledge of remote business engagement solutions & digital platforms.                          Engaging and persuasive personality to motivate, influence and energize Remote Commercial teams and deployment teams in desired direction to achieve business objectives.                          Serves as an advocate, challenges, and drives for major change initiatives.                          Persists in efforts to achieve stretch goals despite barriers.                          Able to educate and train sales force in use of sales enablement tools, advocate remote platform to Regional Leaders, stakeholders.                          Analytical skills to make data driven decisions.                          Willingness to accept responsibility for results, even when working indirectly through others.                          Sets and meets aggressive commitments to achieve business objectives.            Must Have: Minimum Requirements                             Bachelors degree in engineering with consistent high academic performance                          MBA from top tiered institute is preferred.                          Minimum of 7+ years of experience, or 5+ years of relevant experience in leading significant customer experience thru new business technical & engagement solution                          Experience of Go to Market transformation - Planning & Deployment of Remote selling, Remote service support, Contact centers.                          Experience in MNC is preferred.                          Time flexibility to engage across APAC & Global stakeholders.                              Travel   : 50%             Nice to Have                           Self-motivated, enthusiastic and positive                          Organized and able to set and re-set priorities                          Advanced interpersonal skills including communication, presentation, persuasion, and influence.                          Self-driven, ability to work independently, has collaborative mind-set and build strong working relationships.                          Strong team player and track record of working collaboratively to manage cross-functional, cross-business issues and generate impact through others.                          Excels in a matrix structure Organization, is flexible and at ease in all cultural and management level situations.                          Strong business acumen and can recognize problems, opportunities and provide value-added business solutions.                          Strong analytical mind with inclination for problem-solving                          Presentation skills with excellent poise and confidence                          Ability to deal with ambiguity and clarity of thought to be able to plan, develop and drive strategies for BUs. column1: Deputy Dean - E-Governance (For University - Education Sector)
column2: Role Overview: As the Deputy Dean - eGovernance, you will be at the forefront of advancing digital technologies and governance systems within our esteemed university in Bengaluru, Karnataka. Reporting directly to the Chief Technology Officer, you will lead the integration of e-governance initiatives to enhance operational efficiency, transparency, and stakeholder engagement. Key Responsibilities: 1.  Strategic Leadership : Collaborate closely with university leadership to develop and execute a comprehensive e-governance strategy aligned with our institution's mission and objectives. 2.  Policy Development : Formulate and enforce policies governing the utilization of digital platforms and technologies, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards and industry best practices. 3.  Systems Integration : Oversee the seamless integration of e-governance systems with existing university databases, student information systems, and administrative platforms. 4.  Technology Implementation : Assess, select, and implement suitable software solutions to streamline administrative workflows, student enrollment, assessment, and other critical processes. 5.  Data Security : Establish robust data security protocols to safeguard sensitive information and ensure adherence to data protection regulations. 6.  Capacity Building : Provide comprehensive training and support to university staff, faculty, and administrators to enhance their proficiency in utilizing e-governance systems effectively. 7.  Stakeholder Engagement : Foster collaboration with internal and external stakeholders to gather feedback, address requirements, and promote widespread adoption of e-governance solutions. 8.  Performance Monitoring : Develop and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to evaluate the effectiveness of e-governance initiatives and drive continuous improvement. 9.  Budget Management : Take ownership of budget planning and management for e-governance projects, optimizing resource allocation and tracking expenditures effectively. 10.  Research and Innovation : Stay abreast of emerging trends and technologies in e-governance and higher education administration, driving innovation and thought leadership within the university. Qualifications: Master's degree or higher in Computer Science, Information Technology, Public Administration, or a related field. Minimum of 5 years of experience in e-governance, digital transformation, or IT leadership roles within the education sector or government organizations. Proven track record of successfully implementing e-governance initiatives, preferably in a higher education setting. Strong understanding of e-governance frameworks, data management principles, and information security standards. Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse stakeholders. Demonstrated project management expertise, including planning, execution, and monitoring of complex initiatives. Knowledge of relevant laws, regulations, and standards governing e-governance, privacy, and data protection. Application Process: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interviews.
column11: Systems Integration, Performance Monitoring, Technology Implementation, E-governance, Data Security, Institutions, digital platforms, Research and Innovation, University, Academics, Education, compliance, Computer Science, Capacity Building

column2: Senior Project Manager : Job Description: We are looking for an experienced Senior Project Manager to lead our BI analytics, Data Warehousing (DWH), and new product development projects. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in these areas and a proven track record of successfully delivering complex projects on time and within budget. Responsibilities: Lead and manage BI analytics, DWH, and new product development projects from inception to completion. Organize and lead meetings with the customer team to gather requirements, understand business objectives, and discuss technical aspects of the project. Collaborate with stakeholders to define project scope and objectives. Dive deep into the customer's business model, key performance indicators (KPIs), and analytics needs. Identify and prioritize business use cases that align with the customer's strategic goals. Gain a thorough understanding of the customer's IT landscape, including existing systems, data sources, and infrastructure. Identify technical and non-functional requirements that need to be addressed in the proposed solution. Define project scope, goals, and deliverables that support business goals in collaboration with senior management and stakeholders. Develop comprehensive project plans that encompass all project details, including timelines, resources, budget, and risk management strategies. Use agile and waterfall methods as appropriate for project needs. Perform resource planning, including identifying and securing resources, defining roles and responsibilities, and managing resource allocation to ensure project deadlines are met. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including QA, development, and business stakeholders, to ensure project objectives are met. Provide guidance and support to team members to help them achieve project goals. Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks. Develop contingency plans as needed to ensure project success. Track project progress against milestones and deliverables. Use project management tools to monitor and report on project status to stakeholders. Provide regular project updates to stakeholders, including progress reports, risk assessments, and recommendations for project improvement. Ensure project deliverables meet quality standards and are aligned with business requirements. Ensure thoroughness of testing and validation of deliverables before release. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business Administration, or related field; Master's degree preferred. 10+ years of experience in leading BI analytics, DWH, and new product development projects. Strong understanding of technology and architecture, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions. Proven track recordof successfully delivering projects on time and within budget. Self-starter with th e ability to work successfully in a team environment with drive. Experience with agile and waterfall project management methodologies. Excellent communication and leadership skills, with the ability to manage cross-functional teams effectively. Project Management Professional (PMP) certification preferred. Certified Scrum Master (CSM) certification preferred. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Detail-oriented with a high level of accuracy. Committed to the values of integrity, accountability, and customer centric

column2: We are looking for a Program Manager with a strong delivery record and proven project management experience to provide leadership, coordination and management of processes and functions for the SLP SPC (Standards, Procedure & Compliance) Program who has the ability and initiatives to understand the business needs, analyze issues and influence solutions/outcomes        We are also looking for a team player who not only leverages his/her own team to respond effectively to a variety of program needs, but is also able to work closely with key Stakeholders to effectively prioritize and implement programs based on customer need - from excellence initiatives processes to sustainable mechanisms development      In short, you would design, deliver high quality interventions and be responsible for the adherence to risk, quality & governance requirements      The objective of this role is to develop and implement standardized tools and processes that set standards for how SLP initiatives are run, ensure that risk & quality management standards are followed, gather various projects & programs data, production of information for management review, provide a source of guidance and advice for stakeholders, and manage and facilitate the governance process      Hence, this individual must be self-driven and have the capability and confidence to interface effectively with senior leaders and multiple stakeholders, both face to face (or virtually) and across geographies                            KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:                              Lead aspects of the SLP SPC Program Charter that require a single threaded owner outside the existing program areas. Implement and govern status reporting for the various aspects of the programs, providing visibility to the milestones and performance of all projects. Provides administrative support by implementing systems, procedures, and policies; completing projects in support of compliance auditors.                              BASIC QUALIFICATIONS                          Minimum of a Bachelor s degree from an accredited university.        Relevant line experience gained in operational or governance function.      Business Operational Excellence background combined with execution ability is a huge plus.      Must be able to think creatively and possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills.      Proven track record of consistently meeting goals and objectives.      Proven ability to build relationships and manage cross-functional teams.      Excellent presentation and communication skills, specifically strong narrative writing skills.      Ability to handle multiple projects, often with conflicting deadlines.      A track record of using data to develop business cases and decision making.      Proven ability to think creatively and contribute to process simplification/improvement at a team level.
